flow.config.title: Flow Config
flow.config.group.easeIn.desc: Configuration options related to the opening of the inventory.
flow.config.disableEaseIn.desc: Disable the ease in animation when the inventory is opened.
flow.config.easeInType.desc: The type of easing to use when opening the inventory.
flow.config.easeInAnimationType.desc: The type of animation to use when opening the inventory.
flow.config.easeInDuration.desc: The duration of the ease in animation when opening the inventory.
flow.config.group.easeOut.desc: Configuration options related to the closing of the inventory.
flow.config.disableEaseOut.desc: Disable the ease out animation when the inventory is closed.
flow.config.easeOutType.desc: The type of easing to use when closing the inventory.
flow.config.easeOutAnimationType.desc: The type of animation to use when closing the inventory.
flow.config.easeOutDuration.desc: The duration of the ease out animation when closing the inventory.
flow.config.disableBgBlur.desc: Disable the background blur - useful for performance on low-end devices.
flow.config.bgBlurIntensity.desc: The intensity of the background blur when the inventory is open.
flow.config.disableBgTint.desc: Disable the background tint. This isn't recommended.
flow.config.bgColorTint.desc: The color of the background tint when the inventory is open.
flow.config.disabledScreens.desc: A list of screens to disable the inventory on. The value of each list item should be the screen's class name.
flow.config.disableCrossInventoryAnimati: Disable the animations when opening an inventory from another inventory. Useful for servers like Hypixel where many GUIs are inside of inventories and the animations can cause issues.
flow.toast.emi.title: Warning, EMI installed.
flow.toast.emi.description: EMI does not work well with expand animations, it's recommended to use the sliding animations.
